Scales

Translate data columns to visual properties, predominantly colours: fill, line, highlight and sizes: radius, elevation, width, height.

scale_color_category() scale_category()
Scale category
scale_identity()
Scale identity
scale_color_linear() scale_linear()
Scale linear
scale_color_log() scale_log()
Scale log
scale_color_power() scale_power()
Scale power
scale_color_quantile() scale_quantile()
Scale quantile
scale_color_quantize() scale_quantize()
Scale quantize
scale_color_symlog() scale_symlog()
Scale symlog
scale_color_threshold() scale_threshold()
Scale threshold
